author: psmith
msg: * refactored Pause functionality
* Change from Vector -> LoggingEvent
* Event Detail and Tooltip now rendered by a Layout class.

author: psmith
msg: Small modification because of change from Vector -> LoggingEvent

author: psmith
msg: Forced to comment out some code here
while we refactor the model.
Colouring is broken until this is completed.
The colour returned from this method is just
the row stripe colour for the time being.

author: psmith
msg: a refactor of the model interface has been completed
to remove dependance on Vector, replaced with LoggingEvent.
Also removed some methods from the interface, as there
functionality is now supported by other helper methods/classes.
In particular, the getDetailText method has been removed
and replaced with standard Log4j layout methodology.

author: psmith
msg: Refactor of the model to store LoggingEvents rather
than Vectors.
Some code has been moved to other classes where appropriate
and others have been removed.
Filtering is currently inoperable after this change.
